name: Minima01: SuperBombDropDX
description:
Tap! Anticipate! Explode!

Test your gaming skill and timing in this gaming snack

Drop bombs with faultless timing to hit various targets that fly across the screen for maximum points!

Hint: Don't hit the red ones.

Update 2.14: Practically remade the game using what I've learned over the last year. But I also took time to add a countdown at the end of the game, make the Red Tide into a feature that increases difficulty, and messed around with the colours (also allows players to choose the colour set they prefer).
